author: Jemx
post_text: May 2, 2019 at 8:37 PM#1Hey guys,does anyone know, how to create a new effectline inside a effect and how to assign a attribute to it purely via the cmd?I know that i can access a existing line by using e.g.CodeAssign Effect 1.1.1 /rate=0.25but i cant figure out, how to crate a new one and how to assign/change the attribute of a line.Thanks in advance!
title: Creating a new effectline in a effect via cmd
